https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xOqE6TmUecwMPw81FSAtkIAFSjV.jpg Just as "the fluttering of the wings of a butterfly can be felt on the other side of the world" (according to the Chinese proverb) a coffee offered in Naples can be felt in Buenos Aires and replicated in New York. In the bars of threedifferent cities ofthe world, the camera will record the "first flutter" of a coffee cup offered to a customer. Coffee for All
